metadata.title: CVE-2018-18346 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Incorrect handling of alert box display in Blink in Google Chrome prior to71.0.3578.80 allowed a remote attacker to present confusing browser UI viaa crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18346` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 71.0.3578.80-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 71.0.3578.80-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 71.0.3578.80-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 71.0.3578.80-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 71.0.3578.80-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '71.0.3578.80-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
